statements: UPDATE games SET rating = 9.5 WHERE game_id = '5ff3c503-32c0-4c35-a0d7-8fe3b7c9a1df';
UPDATE games SET genre = 'Adventure' WHERE game_name = 'The Legend of Zelda';
UPDATE games SET platform = 'PC' WHERE genre = 'MMORPG';
UPDATE players SET player_level = 5 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE games SET game_genre = 'Adventure' WHERE game_id = 2;
UPDATE players SET player_name = 'Alice' WHERE player_id = 3;
UPDATE Player SET player_name = 'John Doe' WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Game SET genre = 'Action' WHERE game_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Scoreboard SET score = 100 WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND game_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE game SET platform = 'PC' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE player SET username = 'new_username' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE developer SET headquarters = 'New York' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE players SET player_level = player_level + 1 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE games SET game_genre = 'Action' WHERE game_id = 2;
UPDATE achievements SET achievement_name = 'Master of the Game' WHERE player_id = 3;
